Led a team of data engineers in building a scalable data platform on AWS. Designed and implemented data models for marketing campaigns and customer segmentation. Managed and optimized data warehousing solutions (Snowflake). Mentored junior data engineers on best practices for data engineering and cloud computing.

Architected and implemented a new data lake solution using Hadoop and Spark to support advanced analytics and machine learning initiatives. Developed and maintained data pipelines for real-time data ingestion and processing. Collaborated with data scientists to build and deploy machine learning models. Implemented data security and access control policies to ensure data privacy and compliance.
